title: Mr Horatio Knibbles (Captioned)
brief_description: Mr Horatio Knibbles is a magic rabbit that only Mary Bunting can see, Mary’s mother’s jewellery goes missing but with the help of Mr. Knibbles and his friends, Squirrel Postman, Air Mail Pigeon and Mrs. Magpie, the real culprit is found. A live action fantasy. Rated: G.
